vlive.korean: 되게 다르지. - 깔보는 건 우지밖에 없어요. It's very different. - Woozi is the only one who looks down. 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [SEVENTEEN RADIO] 캐럿들 귀대귀대#9

vlive.korean: 많이 자랐지. - 그래서 이제는 깔본다고? - 그게 아니고... You've grown a lot. - So now you look down on us? - No. 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [SEVENTEEN RADIO] 캐럿들 귀대귀대#9

vlive.korean: 막상 내가 가사를 써보니까 내가 이렇게 좀 못하네 하고 깔봤던 사람들 보다도 못하겠는거예요. But as I started writing lyrics myself, I realized that I was worse than the people I thought were bad. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Replay] Basick & Marvel J's 베이식&마블제이의 힙합라이브
